programme.title: Danica De Giorgio
programme.desc: Friday's first dose of fearless opinions with Danica and her team of contributors.

programme.title: Steve Price
programme.desc: One of Australia's most experienced journalists, Steve Price, with his no-nonsense opinions on the day's biggest news.

programme.title: The World According to Rowan Dean
programme.desc: Unique views and provocative insights from the original outsider, Rowan Dean.

programme.title: Neds
programme.desc: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a lack of positive role models, a studious, but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.

programme.title: Cheri
programme.desc: In this superb drama set in pre-World War I Paris, an ageing courtesan has an ill-fated love affair with the son of her rival.

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: UK. Two rebellious teenage dreamers see their friendship shatter as nuclear terror grips the world in the Cuban missile crisis.

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: During World War II, enemy fighter pilots find themselves face to face after shooting down one another's planes over a desolate landscape. In order to survive, they must set aside the rules of war.

programme.title: Nowhere Special
programme.desc: A single father dedicates the last few months of his life to finding a new family for his four-year-old son.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman committed to a mental hospital for much of her life must rely on her diary to recount her memories to a doctor who is reassessing her for the move to a new facility.

programme.title: 44 Inch Chest
programme.desc: A man is shattered by his wife's infidelity. When his friends urge him to exact retribution, he wrestles with remorse, grief and self pity.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: After a job goes wrong, two hit men are ordered by their crime boss to cool their heels in Bruges. They don't make good tourists and soon find themselves in the oddest of circumstances.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
programme.desc: A dignified send-off for a loved one erupts into uproarious chaos when a myriad of outrageous calamities befall the eccentric grief stricken mourners.

programme.title: Wild Target
programme.desc: An assassin with a peerless reputation for lethal efficiency finds himself drawn to one of his intended victims.

programme.title: The Iron Lady
programme.desc: One of the 20th century's most influential women, Margaret Thatcher smashed through barriers of gender and class to be heard in a male-dominated world.

programme.title: Route Irish
programme.desc: A security contractor in Iraq rejects the official explanation of his friend's death and decides to investigate.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: This action adventure documents the true story of the elite 30 Commando unit, formed during World War II by the man who would later become novelist Ian Fleming, and their risky mission in Norway.

programme.title: The Professor and the Madman
programme.desc: James Murray begins compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid 19th century, receiving over 10,000 entries from an asylum patient.

programme.title: White Riot
programme.desc: Telling the story of a vital national protest movement: Rock Against Racism, formed in 1976 when a group of artists united to take on the National Front.

programme.title: Franklyn
programme.desc: Set between the parallel universe of present-day London and a futuristic metropolis, this is a fantasy thriller about four troubled souls whose worlds collide.

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: In early 20th-century Britain, a young working mother joins a diverse group of women who fight for equality and the right to vote.

programme.title: Mr. Turner
programme.desc: An acclaimed account of the great British painter who was a radical and revolutionary artist.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.

programme.title: Hurricane
programme.desc: The tale of the Polish pilot who alongside his comrades of the Polish Air Force, joins the British Royal Air Force to fight during the Battle of Britain.

programme.title: Love and Friendship
programme.desc: A beautiful young widow visits her in-laws' estate while waiting for social chatter about her personal indiscretions to pass.

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: An inspiration film that explores the brilliance of a mathematician that many believed could decipher the very fabric of the universe - possibly existence itself.

programme.title: Neds
programme.desc: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a lack of positive role models, a studious, but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, is tasked with overseeing the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as different sides clash.

programme.title: Journey's End
programme.desc: March, 1918. C-company arrives to take its turn in the front-line trenches in northern France, led by the war-weary Captain Stanhope.

programme.title: The Limehouse Golem
programme.desc: When a series of brutal murders occur in London, the community believes that a legendary dark creature must be responsible.

programme.title: Harry Brown
programme.desc: An elderly ex-marine avenges his friend's vicious murder by meting out his own brand of justice.

programme.title: Swimming with Men
programme.desc: Eric joins an all-male group of synchronised swimmers, discovering that making patterns in a pool can, for a couple of hours at least, smooth out the bumps in his life.

programme.title: The Falling
programme.desc: As a mysterious fainting epidemic breaks out in a strict English girls' school, best friends Abbie and Lydia refuse to believe that there is nothing wrong, and set out to discover the truth.

programme.title: The Seagull
programme.desc: A fading actress, a fresh-faced ingenue, a famous writer and a failing playwright all come up against one another while visiting a country estate.

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Professor Phillip Goodman is a renowned sceptic of all things supernatural who is given the opportunity to investigate three cases of baffling paranormal activity.

programme.title: The Dinosaur Project
programme.desc: In this special effects thriller, a film crew in the Congo discover a lost world filled with terrifying, giant creatures thought extinct for millions of years.

programme.title: Quant
programme.desc: The life of Mary Quant, the designer often credited with the invention of the mini skirt, chronicling her rise from a fashion-conscious tomboy to a daring avant-garde designer.

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A lovesick young woman searches for the father of her unborn child in seedy Birmingham and becomes involved with a mysterious catering manager.

programme.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
programme.desc: Harold is an ordinary man who has passed through life, living on the side lines, until he goes to post a letter one day and just keeps walking.

programme.title: On Chesil Beach
programme.desc: In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure.

programme.title: Elstree 1976
programme.desc: Actors and extras reminisce about their time on the set of Star Wars (1977) and how making the film affected their lives.

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: From the producers of Shaun of the Dead and Hot Fuzz, Attack the Block follows a gang of tough inner-city kids who try to defend their turf against an invasion of savage alien creatures.

programme.title: Farming
programme.desc: A young Nigerian boy is sent to be raised by a white British family in the hopes of a better future, and instead becomes the leader of a white skinhead gang.

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: During World War II, enemy fighter pilots find themselves face to face after shooting down one another's planes over a desolate landscape. In order to survive, they must set aside the rules of war.

programme.title: Freight
programme.desc: A Russian gang in the UK traffic eastern European people and then enslave them, the women to sex, the men to illegal fights. They cross a local businessman, and a war escalates.

programme.title: Toast
programme.desc: Bittersweet story of a food writer's road to adulthood via his association with culinary tastes and smells. A delicious love letter to set to the songs of Dusty Springfield.

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: When a middle-aged carpenter suffers a heart attack, he struggles as he must work his way through the bureaucratic world of welfare.

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: In this compelling drama, a compassionate priest and estranged father confronts his own demons as he senses the menacing forces of his scornful parish closing in around him.

programme.title: Neds
programme.desc: Encompassed by violent street gangs, neglectful parents, bullying teachers and a lack of positive role models, a studious, but emotionally abandoned kid turns thug.

programme.title: Belle
programme.desc: The mixed-race daughter, Dido Elizabeth Belle, of Royal Navy Captain Sir John Lindsay is raised by aristocratic Great-uncle Lord William Murray, 1st Earl of Mansfield in eighteenth century England.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: This action adventure documents the true story of the elite 30 Commando unit, formed during World War II by the man who would later become novelist Ian Fleming, and their risky mission in Norway.

programme.title: Harry Brown
programme.desc: An elderly ex-marine avenges his friend's vicious murder by meting out his own brand of justice.

programme.title: Le Week-End
programme.desc: A long-married couple revisit Paris for a long weekend for the first time since their honeymoon, in hopes of rekindling their relationship - or, perhaps, to bring it to an end.

programme.title: Absolutely Anything
programme.desc: A group of aliens bestow upon a random Earthling the ability to make absolutely anything happen, to see if he uses the power for good or for evil.

programme.title: Comes a Bright Day
programme.desc: Love blooms in the most unusual circumstances when a bellboy and a beautiful shopgirl are taken hostage in a jewel store heist.

programme.title: Bend It Like Beckham
programme.desc: An Indian girl born in England disobeys her strict family in search of a dream: becoming a soccer star like her idol, David Beckham.

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A young Irish woman travels to 1950s Brooklyn and falls in love with her new life, until a family tragedy forces her to choose between the two countries and the people in them.

programme.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
programme.desc: Global affairs are juggled with the all-too-human side of one of history's iconic leaders Franklin D. Roosevelt as he hosts the English royals for an unforgettable weekend in upstate NY.

programme.title: 44 Inch Chest
programme.desc: A man is shattered by his wife's infidelity. When his friends urge him to exact retribution, he wrestles with remorse, grief and self pity.

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: A caving trip goes wrong, trapping a group of women. Stalked by bloodthirsty beasts and turning against each other, they must become as savage as the creatures hunting them.

programme.title: Hope Gap
programme.desc: A couple's visit with their son takes a dramatic turn when the father tells him he plans on leaving his mother.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor moves into a London skyscraper where rising tensions and class warfare lead to anarchy.

programme.title: A Bump Along The Way
programme.desc: Forty-four-year-old single mother, Pamela, finds herself pregnant after a drunken one-night-stand, leaving her tightly-wound teen daughter, Allegra, ashamed of her deadbeat mum.

programme.title: A Guide To Second Date Sex
programme.desc: Laura and Ryan have been totally destroyed by previous relationships. In the hope of getting it right, they go on a second date having no idea what they're supposed to do.

programme.title: Viceroy's House
programme.desc: The final Viceroy of India, Lord Mountbatten, is tasked with overseeing the transition of British India to independence, but meets with conflict as different sides clash.

programme.title: McClaren
programme.desc: The story of Bruce McLaren, the New Zealander who showed the world that a man of humble beginnings could take on the elite of motor racing and win.

programme.title: McKellen: Playing the Part
programme.desc: Built upon a 14-hour interview, this film is a unique journey through the key landmarks of McKellen's life.

programme.title: Oranges and Sunshine
programme.desc: A powerful true story about a social worker who risks all in her effort to reunite families torn apart by a heartless government policy.

programme.title: Mr. Holmes
programme.desc: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with early dementia as he tries to remember both his final case and a mysterious woman whose memory haunts him.

programme.title: The Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: An adaptation of the 1952 Terence Rattigan play The Deep Blue Sea about the wife of a Judge who engages in an affair with a former RAF pilot.

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: After a job goes wrong, two hit men are ordered by their crime boss to cool their heels in Bruges. They don't make good tourists and soon find themselves in the oddest of circumstances.

programme.title: Their Finest
programme.desc: Catrin, an untried screenwriter, and a makeshift cast and crew work under fire to make a film to lift the nation's spirits, and inspire America to join the war.

programme.title: Ammonite
programme.desc: In 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.

programme.title: Rain Dogs
programme.desc: As Costello works her job at a local peep show, a journalist offers an exciting opportunity. Gloria unexpectedly forms a connection at the funeral home, while Selby meanders back to his old ways.

programme.title: Rain Dogs
programme.desc: Costello goes on an underwhelming date, while Iris confides in Gloria. After an old acquaintance from prison demands restitution, Selby comes to Costello with a proposition.

programme.title: Rain Dogs
programme.desc: In Bruton, Costello is finally able to hold a part-time job and live her best life. As cracks in their family unit begin to form, their seemingly perfect new life begins to deteriorate, with devastating results.

programme.title: Rain Dogs
programme.desc: When a visit with her family drudges up old demons, Costello finds the courage to say goodbye to Selby. Allegra arrives to help Selby clean up his act. Gloria receives surprising news.

programme.title: Rain Dogs
programme.desc: As he pines for a phone call from Costello, Selby acclimates to his new reality. Costello has found a safe space to land, but must continue to hustle to make a living.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Home bakers from across the United Kingdom participate in a number of baking challenges and compete against each other to win the prestigious title.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Go Local
programme.desc: The Bikers ride through scenic Northumberland, heading to Wall, a village north of Hexham with a bloody history of Viking raids and historic battles.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs face a blind taste test; in a special dinner service, both teams must prove they have what it takes to stay in the competition.

programme.title: Buddy Valastro's Cake Dynasty
programme.desc: The Mother's Day rush is one of the busiest times of the year, and Buddy is stressed. He must create a custom cake for the 50th Anniversary of the Secretariat's Triple Crown win.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie rustles up a cheesy veggie quesadilla for his family from what's in his fridge, and shares his meatloaf with spaghetti, and fish tikka curry recipes.

programme.title: River Cottage to the Core
programme.desc: Hugh is amazed to look back and see how successful his mission to get people to fruit-ify their meals has been, whether they're meaty mains, fishy first courses, veg dishes or booze.

programme.title: Jamie: Together at Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gets the festivities started with a sublime Christmas party menu of bramble cocktails, a stunning beef bourguignon topped with chestnut and bacon sprinkle.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass
programme.desc: In the final masterclass, Mary and Paul return to the tent to show what they would have made for the challenges in the last weeks of the Great British Bake Off.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits a Manchester factory that churns out 6 million Jaffa Cakes every single day. Cherry Healey is in Jaffa, the city responsible for growing the fruit that gives these cakes their name.

programme.title: Jamie: Together at Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver gets the festivities started with a sublime Christmas party menu of bramble cocktails, a stunning beef bourguignon topped with chestnut and bacon sprinkle.

programme.title: Jamie's Family Christmas

programme.title: Sunday with Michael Portillo
programme.desc: Join Michael Portillo and guests for a relaxed look at the world of politics, culture and the arts.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A lively look at all the latest live and breaking news for the weekend from around the UK with our network of GB News reporters, plus views and debate from a wide range of perspectives.

programme.title: Nana Akua
programme.desc: Join Nana Akua for a fun and feisty romp through the news. She'll be getting the inside scoop on the stories that matter to you and she'll be taking on the big debates of the day.

programme.title: The Camilla Tominey Show Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from this morning. Join Camilla Tominey for a Sunday morning politics show with personality, live from Westminster.

programme.title: Free Speech Nation
programme.desc: Where journalism and comedy meet - round up of the most infuriating stories of the moment, including a comedy take on the week.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight
programme.desc: Join Alex for two hours of lively debate and news making interviews. Top guests tackle the big issues of the day with Alex's fresh take on every story.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight Late Edition
programme.desc: Tomorrow's news, tonight. All the major stories making the front pages and full coverage of all the breaking news at home and abroad with Alex Armstrong.

programme.title: The Late Show Live
programme.desc: Live from Washington DC, Bev Turner and Ben Leo bring you the latest from the US and what it means for Britain.

programme.desc: Andrew and Miriam present Monday to Thursday mornings. When the news happens, it happens here. But what does it mean for you? GB News brings you the biggest stories and the answers you need from across the UK.

programme.desc: Join Martin for an up-to-the-minute take on the day's events delivered in his own unique and lively style.

programme.title: Deliver Us
programme.desc: When a nun in a remote convent claims immaculate conception, priests investigate, concerned she will give birth to twin boys: one the Messiah, the other the Anti-Christ.

programme.title: Project Wolf Hunting
programme.desc: When dangerous criminals on a cargo ship are transported from the Phillipines to South Korea, they unleash a sinister force after an escape attempt leads to a riot.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood And Honey 2
programme.desc: Not wanting to live in the shadows any longer, Winnie-the-Pooh, Piglet, Owl and Tigger take their fight to the town of Ashdown, leaving a bloody trail of death and mayhem in their wake.

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: A reluctant IRA agent discovers that some people just aren't who you expect them to be.

programme.title: Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Two gunrunners and a pregnant policewoman (Tracy Scoggins) are trapped in a warehouse with a bad boy's toys.

programme.title: Top Knot Detective
programme.desc: Takashi Takamoto begins writing jingles for a well-known Japanese company and ends up creating a bloody series of samurai action that, over time, becomes a cult series.

programme.title: Puppet Master
programme.desc: After being contacted by their mysterious former colleague, four psychics arrive at a secluded hotel where they are stalked by a group of murderous puppets.

programme.title: Puppet Master II
programme.desc: The malicious marionettes are back to resurrect their dead master and evict parapsychologists from the family estate.

programme.title: Upstream Color
programme.desc: A woman is abducted and hypnotised with an organic material harvested from a specific flower. When she falls for a man, the two realise he may also have been subjected to the same process.

programme.title: District B13
programme.desc: Captain Damien must team up with Leito, a local insurgent from District 13, to defuse a neutron bomb that has fallen into the hands of a local drug lord, Taha, and rescue Leito's sister Lola.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: A hit man is sent to Spain to kidnap an ex-criminal and transport him to Paris for execution.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Relaxer
programme.desc: With the impending Y2K apocalypse fast approaching, Abbie is faced with the ultimate challenge - the unbeatable level 256 on Pac-Man - and he can't get off the couch until he conquers it.

programme.title: A Bittersweet Life
programme.desc: A gangster starts a violent feud after he refuses to kill his boss's cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Thesis
programme.desc: A Spanish film student (Ana Torrent) finds a videotape showing the torture and murder of a missing coed.

programme.title: Color Out Of Space
programme.desc: A family's retreat to rural life quickly crumbles when a meteorite crashes into their front yard. They attempt to battle a nebulous entity that they can barely understand.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
programme.desc: When a magic sceptre accidentally transports April back through time to 16th-century Japan, the boys take off in hot pursuit, cowabungling their way right out of the sewers.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Howling V: The Rebirth
programme.desc: A werewolf stalks an eclectic group of travellers on hand to attend the opening of a long-sealed European castle.

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A very handsome gentleman finds the love of his life, but suffers an accident and needs to have his face reconstructed through surgery after being severely disfigured.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: An enthusiastic young adventurer follows his dreams into the Amazon jungle with two friends and a guide with a mysterious past.

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.

programme.title: Dark Diamond
programme.desc: After his father's death, a man vows vengeance against the relatives who abandoned him.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Chen Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, Chan Wing Yan goes undercover in the triads as Lau Kin Ming joins the police. Both sides face a common threat from a rival crime boss. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Dobermann
programme.desc: The Dobermann and his gang have been hitting the headlines. Banks, post-offices, bullion vans! The whole works! An anthology of robbery, a compilation of hold-ups!

programme.title: The Chaser
programme.desc: A cop investigates the disappearance of several call girls he pimps out.

programme.title: Pusher
programme.desc: A failed drug deal lands Frank in debt to a ruthless and dangerous Copenhagen drug lord.

programme.title: Hellraiser
programme.desc: A horrifying, living-dead version of Julia's husband appears and coerces her to seduce and kill men so that he can feed on their blood to regain his flesh.

programme.title: Crabs!
programme.desc: In the middle of prom night, a swarm of murderous crabs descends upon a small coastal town.

programme.title: The Parts You Lose
programme.desc: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
programme.desc: Act three in the horror series based on a Stephen King story. Two brothers are adopted by a family. Deadly occurrences follow, amid revelations that one boy was in a bizarre cult in Nebraska.

programme.title: The Wind
programme.desc: Lizzy is settling a remote stretch of land on the 19th-century American frontier, when she begins to sense a sinister presence that seems to be borne of the land itself.

programme.title: You Don't Nomi
programme.desc: Trace Paul Verhoeven's Showgirls' redemptive journey from notorious flop to cult classic, and maybe even masterpiece.

programme.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abbadon Hotel
programme.desc: Eight years after a hotel's tragic opening, an investigative journalist is convinced key evidence remains in the abandoned hotel.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: Under The Silver Lake
programme.desc: Sam, a disenchanted 33-year-old finds a mysterious woman in his apartment's pool. When she vanishes, he embarks on a quest across LA, leading him down a path of mystery.

programme.title: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
programme.desc: A young 14th Century boy with acute psychic powers believes that he can rescue his fellow villagers by tunnelling their way through the earth. To their surprise they come out in New Zealand in 1988.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the body of a young woman.

programme.title: Re-Animator
programme.desc: A medical student (Jeffrey Combs) brings his headless professor back from the dead with a special serum.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset
programme.desc: In the misty forests of North America, a family of Sasquatches find themselves on a collision course with the ever-changing world around them.

programme.title: Sympathy For The Devil
programme.desc: After being forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where it becomes clear that not everything is as it seems.

programme.title: Quest for Fire
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cro-Magnon tribe depends on an ever-burning source of fire, which eventually extinguishes. Lacking the knowledge of how to start a new one, the tribe sends three warriors on a quest.

programme.title: Black Death
programme.desc: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

programme.title: Upstream Color
programme.desc: A woman is abducted and hypnotised with an organic material harvested from a specific flower. When she falls for a man, the two realise he may also have been subjected to the same process.

programme.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: Heathers
programme.desc: Veronica meets a James Dean-type newcomer who suggests they kill off the popular kids and end the cruel, unfair treatment the girls impose on unpopular kids at school.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Detective Joe Kozenczak (Michael Riley) tracks down John Wayne Gacy (Brian Dennehy), convicted in 1980 of 33 Chicago serial killings.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, other-worldly effects.

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is content with his artificial girlfriend: a life-sized doll named Bianca. When he develops feelings for an attractive co-worker, Lars finds himself lost in a unique love triangle.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, Chan Wing Yan goes undercover in the triads as Lau Kin Ming joins the police. Both sides face a common threat from a rival crime boss. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: Prisoners Of The Ghostland
programme.desc: In the treacherous frontier city of Samurai Town, a notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: You Were Never Really Here
programme.desc: Joe is a hired gun who rescues trafficked girls, using brutal methods against those responsible.

programme.title: Noroi: The Curse
programme.desc: A paranormal journalist named Kobayashi goes missing shortly after completing a documentary. What begins as an investigation into strange noises soon evolves into the chilling mystery of a demonic entity.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Lords of Chaos
programme.desc: The origins of Norwegian Black Metal and a group of young men with a flair for publicity, church-burning and murder.

programme.title: Corrective Measures
programme.desc: When a powerless new inmate arrives at a prison for supervillains, he must choose his friends wisely, or become a pawn in the deadly game between the Warden and The Lobe.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Police Story
programme.desc: A kung-fu policeman (Jackie Chan) must protect a female witness (Brigitte Lin) from a Hong Kong drug lord for whom she used to work.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: From their base in the city sewers, turtle heroes Michelangelo, Raphael, Leonardo and Donatello are on a mission to defeat an evil warlord and wipe out crime.

programme.title: Police Story 2
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop's unusual policing methods result in his demotion to traffic duty, despite his success in fighting crime. Meanwhile, an old enemy is released from prison and sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: Severance
programme.desc: A bonding weekend goes horribly wrong for seven colleagues who find themselves facing the chop when they are sabotaged by a deadly enemy. Only the smartest will survive this brutal office outing.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: A Bittersweet Life
programme.desc: A gangster starts a violent feud after he refuses to kill his boss's cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Border Security: Australia's Front Line
programme.desc: Two people from Malaysia claim to be on their honeymoon but their travel itinerary is very odd. Border Force want to know why they are really here.
